Vina Panduwinata Sajikan Aransemen Kekinian untuk The 90's Festival
07 Nov 2019, 06:46 by Windy Eka Pramudya
DIKENAL sebagai salah satu penyanyi senior, Vina Panduwinata akan menampilkan sesuatu yang berbeda di The 90's Festival. Dijadwalkan akan tampil Minggu, 24 November 2019 di Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta, si burung camar ini akan berkolaborasi dengan para musisi muda yang tergabung dalam Close Friends. 
"Di dunia seni itu enggak ada batasan umur. Walaupun The 90's Festival merupakan acara nostalgia, tapi saya akan tetap menyajikan sesuatu yang kekinian. Caranya, saya ajak musisi muda berkolaborasi," ungkap Vina di Harris Vertu Harmoni, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Tim band Close Friends yang berkolaborasi dengan Vina Panduwinata terdiri atas antara lain Ikmal Tobing dan DJ Guslan. Mereka, kata Vina, meracik aransemen lagu lama menjadi terdengar baru dan kekinian. Ini merupakan salah satu usaha Vina untuk merangkul pendengar muda.
"Ini bukan pertama kali saya kolaborasi dengan musisi muda ini. Sebelumnya juga pernah. Awalnya, banyak pendengar yang kaget mendengar lagu saya jadi beda. Akan tetapi, lama-lama mereka menikmati juga dan ikut nyanyi serta bergoyang," kata Vina.
Salah satu musisi muda yang tergabung di Close Friends, Ikmal Tobing mengaku bangga dan terhormat bisa bekerja sama dengan Vina Panduwinata. Dengan konsep yang kekinian, Ikmal merombak deretan hit Vina dengan aransemen elektronik pop. 
"Awalnya saya sempat merasa 'dosa' karena mengubah aransemen lagu Mama Ina --sapaan akrab Vina Panduwinata--. Akan tetapi, harus tega karena kami ingin menampilkan yang berbeda," tutur Ikmal yang merupakan putra musisi senior Jelly Tobing.
Ikmal dkk. menyadari, lagu-lagu Vina telah memiliki pakem dan telah akrab di telinga publik musik Indonesia. Racikan aransemen yang khas, lirik penuh cinta dan sesekali menggoda, serta karakter vokal Vina yang tiada duanya, membuat Close Friends menemukan banyak tantangan untuk membuat aksi Vina Panduwinata menjadi tak biasa.
"Sejauh ini seru bisa kolaborasi dengan Mama Ina. Sebagai musisi, kami kayak dikasih tantangan untuk mengeksplorasi kreativitas," ujar Ikmal.***

Vina Panduwinata Serves Present Arrangements for The 90's Festival
Nov 7 2019, 06:46 by Windy Eka Pramudya
KNOWN as one of the senior singers, Vina Panduwinata will present something different at The 90's Festival. Scheduled to appear Sunday, November 24, 2019 at Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta, the seagull will collaborate with young musicians who are members of Close Friends.
"In the world of art there is no age limit. Although The 90's Festival is a nostalgic event, but I will continue to present something contemporary. How, I invite young musicians to collaborate," said Vina at Harris Vertu Harmoni, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019 .
The Close Friends band team that collaborated with Vina Panduwinata consisted of Ikmal Tobing and DJ Guslan. They, said Vina, formulated the arrangement of old songs to sound new and up to date. This is one of Vina's efforts to reach out to young listeners.
"This is not my first time collaborating with this young musician. Previously, I have. In the beginning, many listeners were surprised to hear my song became different. However, after a long time they enjoyed it too and joined in singing and swaying," Vina said.
One of the young musicians who are members of Close Friends, Ikmal Tobing said he was proud and honored to be able to work with Vina Panduwinata. With the current concept, Ikmal overhauled Vina's hit line with pop electronic arrangements.
"At first I felt 'sinful' because I changed Mama Ina's song arrangement - the familiar greeting of Vina Panduwinata. However, I had to have the heart because we wanted to display something different," said Ikmal who is the son of Jelly Tobing's senior musician.
Ikmal et al. aware, Vina's songs have a grip and are already familiar to the public ear of Indonesian music. The unique arrangement of the arrangement, the lyrics that are full of love and occasional teasing, as well as Vina's vocal character that is second to none, makes Close Friends find many challenges to make Vina Panduwinata's actions unusual.
"So far it has been exciting to collaborate with Mama Ina. As musicians, we are given a challenge to explore creativity," Ikmal said. ***
